Class MusicRecording

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Recording
        |
        +--MusicRecording
public class MusicRecording
extends Recording

This class represents a music recording. It contains additional data members for the artist name and a list of tracks (ie songs). 

     Usage Example:

        MusicRecording myRecording = new MusicRecording("John Lennon", myTrackList, "Double Fantasy",
                                                         12.99, "Rock", "my_image.gif");

Author:
App Development Team

getDuration

public Duration getDuration()
Returns the recording duration. Overrides the method from Recording. Iterates over the list of tracks and keeps a running total of each track's duration.
